author: Rick
content: You've touched on the fact that you like to do your merges by hand, but have you tried Photoshops Merge-to-HDR - using the 'remove ghosts' options? I think it only appeared in CS5, along with a massive overhaul of the controls. Admittedly, I've only used it on an errant arm that encroached into a scene but it seemed to do a pretty good job.
